extendedInfo.description: Less Is More Theme for ADW - Architectural background with brushed metal, wood and glass *Comes with 6 other wallpapers. Check out the thrashed version!*Themed search bar**Metal dock available for EX users*More icons in iconpack**More icons available upon request! djbdotcom@gmail.com  *If you like it please rate*PLEASE READ - TO INSTALL:Make sure you are running ADW.LAUNCHER, press Menu-ADWSettings-Themes Preferences and select ADWTheme Laughing_man - Glass. check theme iconsTIPS: I will continue to update icons, in the meantime, hit menu while in the app draw and use groups to seperate themed icons from non-themed icons

reviews.comment: Please make a voicemail icon. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User
